title: OUR FLOTUS, Chris Breezy, COVID Tests, Man's Reptiles and more.
itunes:title: OUR FLOTUS, Chris Breezy, COVID Tests, Man's Reptiles and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Big Dog takes a chance and he also drops a divine gem for anyone to benefit from. The CLO is the best when it comes to cutting through the BS! Michelle Obama and Phoenix Sun's star Chris Paul have something going on at whenweallvote.org Chris Brown is vindicated! The baddest TV show host gives us the factors that ensure longevity. Steve was brutal today as your favorite play cousin told us that The Lakers lost again. Free COVID tests are out there. Carla threw some slick ones at the fellas in this round of Would You Rather. Muchas problemas a la frontera! Big Dog wraps the week up with some necessary digital advice to enhance your Family Feud experience.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
